short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send texts with a personal touch, at scale, using the phone number you already have.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bulk Texter Pro supports scheduling messages in advance, CSV upload, sending group texts, sending images, previewing generated messages, live progress report during sending, downloading or sending previously sent messages, and much more!

This is the pro version of Bulk Texter Lite.

➤ Features
See the full breakdown of features here:
https://www.bulktexterpro.com/docs/features

➤ How it works
Bulk Texter Pro sends texts by integrating with your existing phone number – whether that's on Dialpad, TextNow, Google Voice, Android, iMessage, or one of our other supported texting platforms. Bulk Texter Pro works by automatically performing clicks and entering text on your behalf on your texting platform's web page.

➤ Terms and Conditions
By installing the extension, you agree to and acknowledge:
https://www.bulktexterpro.com/docs/terms/terms-of-use/
https://www.bulktexterpro.com/docs/terms/privacy-policy/
